alert.note: Alert for Bedford (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 15 at 1:23AM CST until December 15 at 9:20AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee... Wartrace Creek Near Wartrace affecting Bedford County. For the Other Area Rivers...including Wartrace...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Wartrace Creek Near Wartrace. * WHEN...From early this morning to late this morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, water begins to inundate Winette Ayers Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 9.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 930 AM CST.
